title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1700.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1700.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

There is a need to provide a procedure by which inmates may
file claims to recover the value of personal property which has been lost, damaged or destroyed while they have been under custody of the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1700.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
